method.name: Add
method.comment: Adds an item at the end of the ListPlus.

method.name: Reverse
method.comment: This method will sort the Items in the list in reverse order.

method.name: LastIndexOfWith2
method.comment: This method is reserved for B4X Types and B4X Classes related Items. Allows searching by fields or properties of added Items. It is necessary to enter the names of the fields or properties and the desired values and the library will extract those that correspond to the given query. This method will pick up last index of Item with specified Fields or Properties values.

method.name: Remove
method.comment: Removes the specified item.

method.name: SubList
method.comment: This method will create SubList from specified first and last included indexes.

method.name: AddAllFromByteArray
method.comment: Add all items from Array of Bytes to this ListPlus. Byte array must be compatible with B4XSerializator.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialises ListPlus. AllowAddingDifferentTypes As Boolean: True - Allow to add different types of variables and objects in the same ListPlus. False - Only allow's to add the same types of variables or objects. The type of the variables or type of objects will be defined after adding the first object or variable to the ListPlus. For example, if you add a String item first, the following items to add must be of the same type (String).

method.name: ContainsWith
method.comment: This method is reserved for B4X Types and B4X Classes related Items. Allows searching by fields or properties of added Items. It is necessary to enter the name of the field or property and the desired value and the library will extract those that correspond to the given query. This method will check if ListPlus already contains Items with specified Field or Property value.

method.name: IndexesOf
method.comment: Returns the indexes of specified item in ListPlus, or empty temporary ListPlus if there is not specified item.

method.name: IndexesOfAllWith2
method.comment: This method is reserved for B4X Types and B4X Classes related Items. Allows searching by fields or properties of added Items. It is necessary to enter the names of the fields or properties and the desired values and the library will extract those that correspond to the given query. This method will pick up all indexes of Items with specified Fields or Properties values and place all indexes to temporary ListPlus.

method.name: Swap
method.comment: This method will swap two Items at specified indexes.

method.name: Sort
method.comment: Sorts the ListPlus. ListPlus must be initialised as single type ListPlus. The items must all be numbers or strings.

method.name: GetAllWith2
method.comment: This method is reserved for B4X Types and B4X Classes related Items. Allows searching by fields or properties of added Items. It is necessary to enter the names of the fields or properties and the desired values and the library will extract those that correspond to the given query. This method will pick up all the Items with specified Fields or Properties values and place all of them to another temporary ListPlus.

method.name: IndexOf
method.comment: Returns the index of the specified item, or -1 if it was not found.

method.name: ContainsAll
method.comment: Checking if the ListPlus already contains all the specified Items placed in the Array. Supported Array formats: List, ListPlus and all kinds of simple Arrays formats (String(),Object(),Int(),...).

method.name: GetAllWith
method.comment: This method is reserved for B4X Types and B4X Classes related Items. Allows searching by fields or properties of added Items. It is necessary to enter the name of the field or property and the desired value and the library will extract those that correspond to the given query. This method will pick up all the Items with specified Field or Property value and place all of them to another temporary ListPlus.

method.name: RemoveAllAt
method.comment: Removes all the item at the specified indexes placed in Array of indexes. Supported Array formats: List, ListPlus and array of integers (Int()).

method.name: AddAllAt
method.comment: Adds all elements in the specified collection starting at the specified index. Supported Array formats: List, ListPlus and all kinds of simple Arrays formats (String(),Object(),Int(),...).

method.name: AddAllFromFile
method.comment: Add all items from File to this ListPlus. File must be saved with ListPlus library first.

method.name: Get
method.comment: Gets the item in the specified index.

method.name: Contains
method.comment: Checking if the ListPlus already contains the specified Item.

method.name: LastIndexOf
method.comment: Returns the index of the last specified item in ListPlus, or -1 if it was not found.

method.name: RemoveAllWith2
method.comment: This method is reserved for B4X Types and B4X Classes related Items. Allows searching by fields or properties of added Items. It is necessary to enter the names of the fields or properties and the desired values and the library will extract those that correspond to the given query. This method will remove all the Items with specified Fields or Properties values.

method.name: RemoveAll
method.comment: Removes all the specified items in Array. Supported Array formats: List, ListPlus and all kinds of simple Arrays formats (String(),Object(),Int(),...).

method.name: RemoveAt
method.comment: Removes the item at the specified index.

method.name: RemoveAllWith
method.comment: This method is reserved for B4X Types and B4X Classes related Items. Allows searching by fields or properties of added Items. It is necessary to enter the name of the field or property and the desired value and the library will extract those that correspond to the given query. This method will remove all the Items with specified Field or Property value.

method.name: ToArray
method.comment: Cast ListPlus to array of Objects.

method.name: ToBytes
method.comment: Cast ListPlus to array of Bytes. Items in list must be compatible with B4XSerializator.

method.name: Set
method.comment: Replaces the current item in the specified index with the new item.

method.name: WriteToFile
method.comment: Write items from ListPlus to a file on specified location with specified name. Items in ListPlus must be compatible with B4XSerializator.

method.name: SortWith
method.comment: ListPlus must be initialised as single type ListPlus. Sorts a list with items of user defined type or class. The ListPlus is sorted based on the specified field or property name. FieldOrPropertyName - The field or property name that will be used for sorting. Field or property must contain numbers or strings. Ascending - Whether to sort ascending or descending. CaseInsensitive - Whether to ignore the characters case.

method.name: ToList
method.comment: Cast ListPlus to B4X List.

method.name: Clear
method.comment: Removes all the items from the ListPlus.

method.name: IndexesOfAllWith
method.comment: This method is reserved for B4X Types and B4X Classes related Items. Allows searching by fields or properties of added Items. It is necessary to enter the name of the field or property and the desired value and the library will extract those that correspond to the given query. This method will pick up all indexes of Items with specified Field or Property value and place all indexes to temporary ListPlus.

method.name: AddAt
method.comment: Adds the item at the specified index.

method.name: ContainsWith2
method.comment: This method is reserved for B4X Types and B4X Classes related Items. Allows searching by fields or properties of added Items. It is necessary to enter the names of the fields or properties and the desired values and the library will extract those that correspond to the given query. This method will check if ListPlus already contains Items with specified Fields or Properties values.

method.name: CopyAllTo
method.comment: This method will copy all items to other ListPlus.

method.name: ContainsAny
method.comment: Checking if the ListPlus already contains any of the specified Items placed in the Array. Supported Array formats: List, ListPlus and all kinds of simple Arrays formats (String(),Object(),Int(),...).

method.name: CopyAllTo2
method.comment: This method will copy all items from ListPlus to other List.

method.name: Shuffle
method.comment: This method will sort the Items in the ListPlus randomly.

method.name: LastIndexOfWith
method.comment: This method is reserved for B4X Types and B4X Classes related Items. Allows searching by fields or properties of added Items. It is necessary to enter the name of the field or property and the desired value and the library will extract those that correspond to the given query. This method will pick up last index of Item with specified Field or Property value.

method.name: AddAll
method.comment: Adds all elements in the specified collection to the end of the ListPlus. Supported Array formats: List, ListPlus and all kinds of simple Arrays formats (String(),Object(),Int(),...).

property.name: Size
property.comment: Returns the number of Items in the ListPlus.
